content: Here's a link to CTO @Wayne Kubick 's email today about the .... dare I say ... confluence of the two chat platforms
I mean, the other chat was an absolute ghost town
It should be noted that no streams have been merged here. An archive of all past streams is available here: https://hl7webmaster.github.io/zulip-hl7-org/

So we have to recreate them from scratch.
Is there a chance for a naming convention for all streams?
I think the expectation is that CDA stuff will start with CDA and v2 stuff will start with v2. We're not going to rename all of the FHIR stuff
usually we use fhir/ or cds hooks/ so it would make sense for v2/ and cda/ as prefixes
